title: Nicola Sturgeon considering second independence vote
content: SNP leader says 2016 manifesto will set out triggers for second referendum following party’s spectacular gains in general electionScottish nationalist leader Nicola Sturgeon will include triggers for a second independence referendum in the party’s manifesto for the 2016 Scottish election, according to reports. The Sunday Herald said Sturgeon had told the newspaper in an interview that the 2016 manifesto would set out triggers for a second independence referendum, though it did not immediately supply a direct quote from Sturgeon.  Continue reading...
